name: 挂到1000级-Idle to level 1000
detailed_description:
This is a simple idle game. The core gameplay of the game is to rationally allocate attribute points for different classes and equip them with gear suitable for their respective classes. Only in this way can characters deal massive damage and instantly defeat monsters.

The main gameplay features include:

  • Normal Maps: Explore different areas on the map, ranging from easy to difficult.

  • Trial Tower: Each floor of the Trial Tower has a monster, and the difficulty increases successively. It drops high - level book fragments, refinement stones, evolution gems, divine equipment fragments, and so on. After defeating one monster, you can automatically challenge the next one until you are defeated.

  • Equipment: Equipment is divided into ordinary equipment, divine equipment, and evolved equipment.

    • The attributes of ordinary equipment are randomly generated.

    • Divine equipment has no level requirement. Its hidden attribute values can increase significantly as the character's level and attributes grow. However, this type of equipment is very rare in map drops and requires good luck. You can also obtain divine equipment fragments in the Trial Tower and use them to synthesize the complete equipment.

    • Evolved equipment is a special type of equipment that can be evolved. It requires a relatively high level to be worn. It also has hidden attributes, and its attribute values increase significantly with the evolution level and the growth of equipment attribute points.

  • Mining: Sometimes, when you need to obtain more gems, you can go to the gem mine to mine. Mining is automated. You just need to collect the gems after a certain period.

  • Smelting: In the smelting system, you can synthesize books, refine equipment, and combine divine equipment fragments into complete divine equipment.

  • Quests: There is a series of quests in the game. Completing these quests can earn you diamonds, which can be used to purchase special items in the store.

  • Currency: There are only two types of currency in the game, gold coins and diamonds. Gold coins can be obtained by selling ordinary equipment, while diamonds can be obtained by completing quests or selling purple - grade equipment.

short_description: This is a 2D idle game. You can choose 8 professions to team up and fight monsters and brush equipment. By selecting different attributes for different professions and adding points, the combat effectiveness of the character can be significantly improved.
supported_languages: English, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
